q.para: Q: Can I order items from the gift shop online?

a.para: A: We do not have an online gift shop at this time.

q.para: Q: Where do you sell Target and Swarovski merchandise?

a.para: A: Exclusive Swarovski merchandise is available at our retail kiosk on the 67th floor. Target&#174 merchandise is available on the 69th floor.

q.para: A: The return policy of Top of the Rock retail shops is to offer a prompt refund or exchange of merchandise within the following guidelines:

para.bullet: Merchandise returned with a valid receipt can be returned at any time and will be exchanged or refunded for the purchased price.
Merchandise returned with a valid receipt will be refunded in the same tender type as the original purchase.
Rockefeller Center merchandise must have all tags and tickets attached for return, and must be accompanied by a valid receipt.
Merchandise returned without a valid receipt may be exchanged at the current selling price, or may be returned for a merchandise credit.
Merchandise credits cannot be replaced if lost or stolen.
Returns over $150 must be witnessed and signed off by a manager or lead cashier.
